The following information was supplied relating to ethical approvals (i.e., approving body and any reference numbers):
We used human participants in the sense that we emailed known experts in the field to participate in an exert opinion survey. An Ethics Committee is not required in this case (in Italy).
The following information was supplied regarding data availability:

The questionnaires, ranking the threats for each of the 19 experts, are provided in the Supplemental Information as a single .csv file where each expert is identified with a letter. These are listed in random order so as to maintain anonymity.
